Crayon Shin Chan Shokkugan! Densetsu o Yobu Omake Daiketsusen!!
name: Crayon Shin-Chan Shokkugan! Densetsu o Yobu Omake Daiketsusen!!
overview: Crayon Shin-Chan Shokkugan! Densetsu o Yobu Omake Daiketsusen!! is an Action game, developed and published by Bandai Namco Games, which was released in Japan in 2010.
